unnormalised: Hey folks! Solar rooftop subsidies are a game changer, no? Imagine saving serious Rs. on electricity bills in Mumbai, especially with those summer ACs blasting! My cousin, Priya, in Kerala installed panels last Onam and is bragging about the savings. Plus, gotta feel good about reducing our carbon footprint, right? Think of all the delicious biryani we can afford with the extra cash! Heard the MNRE is pushing hard, so let's take advantage, like Sharmaji did in Delhi! Makes sense for Bharat, doesn't it? Maybe I'll get some installed before Diwali!
